statements: SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM games WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT game_id, game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE genre LIKE 'RPG%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games;
SELECT MAX(release_year) FROM games;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM games;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_year FROM games ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) FROM games GROUP BY genre;
SELECT AVG(release_year) FROM games WHERE genre = 'Adventure';
SELECT MIN(game_id) FROM games WHERE genre = 'Sports';
SELECT game_id, game_name FROM games WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2005 AND 2010;
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM games WHERE genre = 'Puzzle' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_year < 2000 AND genre = 'Strategy';
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM games WHERE genre = 'Simulation' AND release_year = 2015;
SELECT game_id, game_name, genre FROM games WHERE game_name LIKE '%Mario%';
SELECT * FROM games LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_year > 2012 LIMIT 10;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM games GROUP BY release_year;
SELECT game_id, game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_year >= 2010 AND genre IN ('Shooter', 'Survival');
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_level > 50;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM games ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id WHERE players.player_level > 50;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id WHERE games.release_year < 2000;
SELECT player_name AS Player, game_name AS Game FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalPlayers FROM players;
SELECT AVG(player_level) AS AvgPlayerLevel FROM players;
SELECT MIN(release_year) AS EarliestReleaseYear, MAX(release_year) AS LatestReleaseYear FROM games;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(game_id) AS TotalGamesPlayed FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT game_genre, COUNT(*) AS TotalGames FROM games GROUP BY game_genre HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT player_name, game_name, DATEDIFF(NOW(), DATE) AS DaysSinceLastPlayed FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT * FROM scores;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM scores;
SELECT players.player_name, games.game_name, scores.score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id INNER JOIN games ON scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM scores;
SELECT players.player_name, games.game_name, scores.score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id INNER JOIN games ON scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM scores;
SELECT players.player_name, games.game_name, scores.score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id INNER JOIN games ON scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT * FROM Game;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM Game;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM Game;
SELECT title, platform FROM Game WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, email, country FROM Player;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM Player;
SELECT player_name FROM Player WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Scoreboard;
SELECT game_id, player_id, score FROM Scoreboard WHERE score > 10000;
SELECT game_id, MAX(score) AS high_score FROM Scoreboard GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT game_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Scoreboard GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT * FROM GameReview;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM GameReview GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM GameReview GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT game_id, player_id, review_text FROM GameReview WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT player_name, review_text FROM Player JOIN GameReview ON Player.player_id = GameReview.player_id;
SELECT game_id, title, rating FROM Game JOIN GameReview ON Game.game_id = GameReview.game_id;
SELECT G.title, GR.rating, P.player_name FROM Game G JOIN GameReview GR ON G.game_id = GR.game_id JOIN Player P ON GR.player_id = P.player_id;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT PlayerName, Age FROM Player;
SELECT PlayerName, Email FROM Player WHERE Age > 20;
SELECT PlayerName, HighScore FROM Player WHERE HighScore > 1000;
SELECT GameName FROM Game;
SELECT GameName, Genre FROM Game WHERE ReleaseDate > '2022-01-01';
SELECT PlayerID, GameID FROM PlayerGameHistory;
SELECT PlayerID, PlayTimeInHours FROM PlayerGameHistory WHERE GameID = 1;
SELECT ItemName, Quantity FROM PlayerInventory;
SELECT PlayerID, ItemName, Quantity FROM PlayerInventory WHERE Quantity > 5;
SELECT ReviewID, Rating FROM GameReview;
SELECT ReviewID, GameID, Rating FROM GameReview WHERE PlayerID = 1;
SELECT PlayerName, Age, HighScore FROM Player WHERE HighScore > 500 ORDER BY HighScore DESC;
SELECT GameName, Genre, Platform FROM Game WHERE ReleaseDate < '2021-01-01';
SELECT PlayerID, GameID, Score FROM PlayerGameHistory WHERE PlayerID = 1;
SELECT ItemName, Quantity FROM PlayerInventory WHERE PlayerID = 1;
SELECT GameName, Rating, ReviewText FROM GameReview WHERE Rating > 3;
SELECT PlayerName, Email, Age, HighScore FROM Player WHERE Age < 30 ORDER BY Age;
SELECT GameName, Genre, Platform FROM Game WHERE Genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY ReleaseDate DESC;
SELECT PlayerID, GameID, PlayTimeInHours, Score FROM PlayerGameHistory WHERE PlayerID = 1 AND Score > 1000;
